questions_and_answers.question: Do NMAMIT have their own bank and post office?
questions_and_answers.answer: Yes, they do have their own bank and post office. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/commercial-units.php

questions_and_answers.question: Does NMAMIT have a canteen inside the campus?
questions_and_answers.answer: Yes, NMAMIT have a canteen named Sri Durga Cafeteria and Kitchen Bells. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/canteen.php

questions_and_answers.question: How many seminar halls are available in our college?
questions_and_answers.answer: There are 6 seminar halls available in our college: Sadananda Open Air Auditorium, Sambhram Auditorium, Shambhavi Auditorium, Sowparnika Seminar Hall, Phalguni Seminar Hall, MCA Seminar Hall. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/auditorium.php

questions_and_answers.question: Where is Sadananda Open Air Auditorium located on campus?
questions_and_answers.answer: Sadananda Open Air Auditorium is located behind Dr. NSAM First Grade College Building. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/auditorium.php

questions_and_answers.question: Where is Sambhram Auditorium located on campus?
questions_and_answers.answer: Sambhram Auditorium is located in the basement of the Main Building. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/auditorium.php

questions_and_answers.question: Where is Shambhavi Auditorium located on campus?
questions_and_answers.answer: Shambhavi Auditorium is located on the 1st Floor, Administrative Block. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/auditorium.php

questions_and_answers.question: Where is Sowparnika Seminar Hall located on campus?
questions_and_answers.answer: Sowparnika Seminar Hall is located on the 1st Floor, Main Building. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/auditorium.php

questions_and_answers.question: Where is Phalguni Seminar Hall located on campus?
questions_and_answers.answer: Phalguni Seminar Hall is located on the 2nd Floor, Main Building. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/auditorium.php

questions_and_answers.question: Where is MCA Seminar Hall located on campus?
questions_and_answers.answer: MCA Seminar Hall is located on the 4th Floor, MCA Department, Main Building. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/auditorium.php

questions_and_answers.question: Is there a stationery shop located inside the campus?
questions_and_answers.answer: NET INSITITUTE is the stationery shop located inside the campus. They distribute course material at competitive prices, which includes books, record books, uniform material, etc.

questions_and_answers.question: What facilities are provided by the central library of NMAMIT?
questions_and_answers.answer: The facilities provided by the central library include literary club activities, Library awareness Quiz, Question Paper Archives, New arrivals service. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/library.php

questions_and_answers.question: What are the operating hours of the central library?
questions_and_answers.answer: The central library is open from 8:00 AM to 11:00 PM.

questions_and_answers.question: What facilities are available in the guest house for parents and guardians of students visiting the college?
questions_and_answers.answer: The guest house offers furnished rooms equipped with amenities such as AC, cot, wardrobe, telephone, TV, and internet connection in each room.

questions_and_answers.question: Who can make bookings for the guest house?
questions_and_answers.answer: Bookings for the guest house must be made by the student at least 3 days before the arrival of their parents or guardians.

questions_and_answers.question: Who else is accommodated in the guest house apart from parents and guardians of students?
questions_and_answers.answer: VIPs, institute guests, and invited guests are also accommodated in the guest house.

questions_and_answers.question: What is the procedure for booking a room in the guest house?
questions_and_answers.answer: Students need to make bookings for their parents or guardians at least 3 days in advance of their arrival.

questions_and_answers.question: Is there any charge for staying in the guest house?
questions_and_answers.answer: Yes, there is a nominal rent charged for staying in the guest house.

questions_and_answers.question: Who is the contact person for inquiries or bookings at the Guest House in Nitte?
questions_and_answers.answer: The contact person is Mr. Jagannath Shetty.

questions_and_answers.question: How can individuals make inquiries or bookings at the Guest House in Nitte?
questions_and_answers.answer: Individuals can make bookings via phone at 08258-281288 or 08258-281388.

questions_and_answers.question: Who should one contact for any queries related to the Guest House in Nitte?
questions_and_answers.answer: For any inquiries or bookings regarding the Guest House in Nitte, individuals should contact Mr. Jagannath Shetty, the Manager.

questions_and_answers.question: How are student representatives selected for each class within the college?
questions_and_answers.answer: Student representatives for each class are elected by the students within that class.

questions_and_answers.question: What are the responsibilities of the student representatives?
questions_and_answers.answer: The student representatives coordinate all academic activities and ensure the provision of necessary facilities for their respective classes.

questions_and_answers.question: How are active student members selected for the core group responsible for organizing campus activities?
questions_and_answers.answer: Students are selected by their peers to be part of the core group responsible for organizing all activities on campus, including co-curricular and extracurricular activities.

questions_and_answers.question: Who provides guidance to the core group of students in organizing campus activities?
questions_and_answers.answer: The core group of students receives guidance from faculty members, and their activities are mentored and monitored under the advice of the Dean of Student Welfare.

questions_and_answers.question: How is the funding for events organized by the core group obtained?
questions_and_answers.answer: The required funding for the conduct of events is provided by the college management.

questions_and_answers.question: What is the name of sports complex at NMAMIT, Nitte?
questions_and_answers.answer: The name of the sports complex at NMAMIT, Nitte is BC Alva Sports Complex.

questions_and_answers.question: Do NMAMIT have their own sports grounds?
questions_and_answers.answer: Yes, NMAMIT has separate Cricket ground, football ground, and a Hockey ground with a 400-meter track.

questions_and_answers.question: When does the B.C Alva ground open?
questions_and_answers.answer: The B.C Alva ground opens at 3:30 P.M.

questions_and_answers.question: What is the purpose of the mock online aptitude and technical skill tests conducted by the department of placement?
questions_and_answers.answer: The purpose of these tests is to provide pre-final year students with hands-on experience in attempting online aptitude and technical rounds, similar to those conducted by companies during campus placements.

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects are covered in these mock tests?
questions_and_answers.answer: The mock tests cover quantitative aptitude, logical reasoning, language skills, and coding.

questions_and_answers.question: What is the name of the online testing portal created by the students?
questions_and_answers.answer: The online testing portal created by the students is called Nitte Lakshya.
